
{{alias}}( [out,] a, b )
    Multiplies two signed 32-bit integers and returns an array of two signed
    32-bit integers which represents the 64-bit signed integer product.

    Parameters
    ----------
    out: ArrayLikeObject (optional)
        The output array.

    a: integer
        Signed 32-bit integer.

    b: integer
        Signed 32-bit integer.

    Returns
    -------
    out: ArrayLikeObject
        Double word product.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 1, 10 )
    [ 0, 10 ]

    See Also
    --------
